I have my family members in my heart, even if I've never met them.
my inspiration is clasical music.

content.text: Not much, just walking my clients' dogs. It's a beautiful day outside, isn't it?
It is! I love the Fourth of July. My favorite color is red, white, and blue.
Mine too! I have a lot of red, white, and blue in my house.
That's awesome! I have long hair for a boy, and I dye it fire engine red. It's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
That's cool! I'm not sure what ethnicity I am, but I like to think I'm a little bit of everything.
That's cool! I'm a mother of two. Do you have any kids?
I don't, but I have a lot of family members in my heart, even if I've never met them.
Classical music. I love the way it makes me feel.
That's cool! I don't talk a lot, but I love to listen to music.
Me too! I love to listen to music while I'm walking my clients' dogs. It's relaxing.
That sounds nice. I'm going to go for a walk now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
